generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with lane markings and tram tracks, which is clearly a road.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian area is visible on the right side of the road, separated by a curb and posts, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: There is a multi-story structure with windows and a lit entrance on the left side of the road, which is a building.
- wall: A large, textured wall made of bricks or stone is visible on the right side of the road, which is a wall.
- fence: A low barrier with vertical posts is running along the edge of the sidewalk on the right, which is a fence.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs, which are poles.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible above the road, which is a traffic light.
- traffic sign: Directional signs are visible on a pole on the right side of the road, which are traffic signs.
- vegetation: Some greenery or trees are visible behind the wall on the right side of the road, which is vegetation.
- sky: The upper part of the image shows a dark, open sky with streetlights, which is the sky.
- person: A blurred figure is visible inside a glass enclosure on the right side of the road, which is a person.
- bus: A white vehicle with the word "EUROPUTER" on its rear and red brake lights is visible ahead, which is a bus.
- train: There are tram tracks on the road, indicating the presence of a train (tram) system.
- car: A few cars are visible ahead of the bus, which are cars.
